mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.activity_id, a.title as activity_title, r.user_id, u.real_name as user_name, u.avatar as user_avatar, r.registration_id, r.rating, r.content, r.tags, r.create_time FROM review r LEFT JOIN activity a ON r.activity_id = a.id LEFT JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.id = #{id} AND r.is_deleted = 0
